trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: When your asynchronous receive operation calls an event handler, an instance of this class is passed to the handler.
trans-unit.target: 當非同步 (Asynchronous) 接收作業呼叫事件處理常式時，會將這個類別的執行個體 (Instance) 傳遞至處理常式。

trans-unit.source: When you use event notification to receive messages asynchronously from the queue, you must create a method that handles your message processing.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用事件通知以非同步方式從佇列接收訊息時，您必須建立處理訊息的方法。

trans-unit.source: Your code must call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> to begin the asynchronous processing.
trans-unit.target: 您的程式碼必須呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>開始執行非同步處理序。

trans-unit.source: When a message is received, your application is notified through the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 收到訊息時，會通知您的應用程式透過<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs> is passed into the event delegate that calls your event handler.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs>傳入呼叫事件處理常式的事件委派。

trans-unit.source: The data associated with the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted> event is contained in the delegate's <xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs.AsyncResult%2A> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 與相關聯的資料<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted>事件包含在委派中<xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs.AsyncResult%2A>參數。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to provide notification of event completion: event notification and callbacks.
trans-unit.target: 有兩種方式來提供事件完成的通知： 事件通知和回呼。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs> is used only with event notification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs> 僅適用於事件通知。

trans-unit.source: For information comparing callbacks and event notification, see "Events vs. Callbacks" on MSDN.
trans-unit.target: 比較回呼和事件通知的資訊，請參閱 < 事件與比較。回呼 」 MSDN 上。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs> provides access to the message that initiated the end of the asynchronous receive operation, through the <xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs.Message%2A> member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs> 提供存取的訊息，起始結束非同步接收作業中，透過<xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs.Message%2A>成員。

trans-unit.source: This is an alternate access to the message, and behaves much the same as a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這是替代存取訊息，而且行為就如同呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an event handler for the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted> event and associates it with the event delegate by using the <xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventHandler>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted>事件並將它與事件委派使用<xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventHandler>。

trans-unit.source: The event handler, `MyReceiveCompleted`, receives a message from a queue and writes its body to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式， `MyReceiveCompleted`、 接收來自佇列的訊息，並將其本文寫入至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the result of the asynchronous operation requested.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要求的非同步作業結果。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that contains the data associated with the receive operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />，包含與接收作業相關聯的資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs.AsyncResult%2A> identifies ongoing or completed asynchronous operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs.AsyncResult%2A> 指出正在進行中或已完成的非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: The property contains data that helps determine which of several potential asynchronous operations to complete, and when passed to the event handler, enables <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%2A> to access the message associated with the completed operation.
trans-unit.target: 屬性包含資料，可協助判斷哪些數個潛在的非同步作業完成，並傳遞至事件處理常式時，可讓<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%2A>存取已完成之作業相關聯的訊息。

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>, a <xref:System.IAsyncResult> is returned immediately, even though a message, if one exists, has not yet been retrieved because the operation is not completed.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>、<xref:System.IAsyncResult>即使訊息時，如果有的話，具有尚未擷取因為作業未完成，立即傳回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs.AsyncResult%2A> indicates the state of the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs.AsyncResult%2A>表示非同步作業的狀態。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> creates the object, which is modified throughout the operation until <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%2A> completes it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> 建立物件，因為它會修改整個作業，直到<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%2A>完成它。

trans-unit.source: Gets the message associated with the asynchronous receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得與非同步接收作業關聯的訊息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> that represents the end result of the asynchronous receive operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" />，表示非同步接收作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs.Message%2A> property provides a means for retrieving the message that initiated the end of the asynchronous receive operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs.Message%2A>屬性提供一種方法，用於擷取起始結束非同步的訊息接收作業。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is called the first time the <xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs.Message%2A> property is read, so it is not necessary to call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%2A> prior to getting the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 第一次呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs.Message%2A>屬性唯讀，因此不需要呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%2A>之前取得這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs.Message" /> could not be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 無法擷取 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: The time-out on the asynchronous operation might have expired.
trans-unit.target: 非同步作業可能已經逾時。
